name: getprojectsbytopic
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool a_i_smartable.
Tool description: The A.I. Smartable API offers the artificial intelligence news, learning resources, companies, influencers, events and other information.
API description: Fetches artificial intelligence projects based on the specified topic and page number.

topic.description: The topic to filter AI projects.

page.description: The page number of the results to fetch.
